articles.description: Watch live coverage from the third day of the 2023 Cycling World Championships in Glasgow.
articles.title: Watch: 2023 Cycling World Championships

articles.description: Text updates of Ireland's first World Cup warm-up as they face Italy at the Aviva Stadium in Dublin.
articles.title: Ireland begin World Cup warm-up against Italy - live text

articles.description: Watch BBC Three live on BBC iPlayer.
articles.title: Watch: Fifa Women's World Cup highlights. VideoWatch: Fifa Women's World Cup highlights

articles.description: Wales enjoy victory in the opening World Cup warm-up game against England in Cardiff to leave Steve Borthwick mulling over Monday's tournament selection.
articles.title: Wales defeat disappointing England in Cardiff

articles.description: Great Britain's Charlie Hatton wins downhill mountain bike gold at the 2023 World Cycling Championships.
articles.title: 'Incredible run!' GB's Hatton wins downhill mountain bike gold

articles.description: England grind down defending champions New Zealand to make history and reach a first Netball World Cup final.
articles.title: England beat New Zealand to reach first World Cup final

articles.description: Dillian Whyte returns "an adverse finding" from a doping test, causing his heavyweight rematch against Anthony Joshua to be cancelled.
articles.title: Whyte out of Joshua fight after 'adverse' dope test

articles.description: Watch highlights as England defeat defending champions New Zealand 46-40 to secure a place in their first ever Netball World Cup final.
articles.title: Watch England's 'thrilling' win over NZ - highlights

articles.description: Scotland mount a stunning fightback from 18 points down to beat France with 14 men in a World Cup warm-up at Murrayfield.
articles.title: Scotland storm back with 14 men to stun France

articles.description: Watch highlights as Japan take a step closer to a second Women's World Cup title after beating Norway 3-1, to set up a quarter final against either the USA or Sweden.
articles.title: Superb Japan into quarter finals after Norway win
